name: Santa's Delivery (hexagonsgalore, melonfarm)
description:
Help Santa deliver his presents on time and avoid getting caught by naughty kids!

Features
  • Pixel art and annoyingly catchy Christmas tunes
  • Late 90s feel
  • Play time: ~15 minutes
  • Holiday spirit
Credits

Made by Melon and Haiku for the 32-bit Holiday Jam.
